evidence.text: MOTION for Leave to Appeal For Certifcation of Order Dated March 30, 2020 For Interlocutory Appeal Pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1292(b) by United States of America.
While "[t]he Ninth Circuit's guidance as to what constitutes a controlling question of law is minimal," it is well settled that...

extracted.value: Appeal: United States of America appealed to Ninth Circuit.
